Name: Veritex
About the game: Welcome to Veritex, a multiplayer survival game. The goal is to survive versus the wilderness around you, build bases, and fend off other players tat can murder you and take your loot. FEATURES Crafting system You can craft so many items, like torch or a new weapon. Crafting will be your best friend. Resource gathering Beside the crafting system, you need to collect resources. From fruits to wood,s from metal to clothes, our gathering system can provide a full range of resources that will help you to survive in the world of Veritex. Single player Try the survival experience with the single player mode of Veritex. Online multiplayer Try to survive among other players in our online mode. Will you be a friend or a foe?
